titleStmt.title: Childrens bread or, A briefe forme of Christian doctrine, necessary for the instruction of such as are ignorant; and for the edification of such as have attained some measure of knowledge. By Tho: Wolfall minister of the Gospel, and pastour of Stanerton in Northumberland.
titleStmt.author: Wolfall, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Iohn Bellamie, at the sign of the three golden Lyons in Cornhil, neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the three golden Lyons in Cornhil, neer the Royall Exchange
